dblp.social.loader
Class PartFile

java.lang.Object
  dblp.social.loader.PartFile

public class PartFile
extends java.lang.Object

This class is an in-memory structure which contains informations on a single _partFile. Each _partFile is the result of a previous execution of the pre parser

Author:
staffiero

Constructor Detail

PartFile

public PartFile()
Empty constructor

PartFile

public PartFile(java.lang.String sourcePath,
                java.lang.String filePath,
                long checkpoints,
                int checkpointsStep)
The constructor to be used

Parameters:
sourcePath - the path of the source dblp xml file
filePath - the absolute path of the _partFile
checkpoints - the number of checkpoints in the _partFile
checkpointsStep - the checkpoints step (the number of "main" dblp tags between two checkpoints)

hasBeenUpdated

public boolean hasBeenUpdated()
Getter. When the current parse status is saved the part file is considered updated if and only if the saved status (last checkpoint, last offset) is greater than the previous stored status

Returns:
true if the partFile has been updated, false otherwise

setUpdated
